name: Winter: The tale of a flame
name_original: Winter: The tale of a flame
description:
Winter falls. A small flame, lonely but optimistic and happy, decides to travel to find a warm refuge to survive.

Temperature descended abruptly, you must find a way to a warmer region. Travel across caves and mountains, pass through winter and water, and help another flames in the same situation as you.

Made in under a week for Brackeys Game 2021.1 where the theme was "Stronger together". All assets made by me.
